item.title: The Super-Human Project: Distance-Sense
item.description: Alright, so recently I decided to use sensor for different applications. Sensors are a great way to hear, see, and even feel things that we as humans can’t see or hear. This post is the first in a long series to come about making, circuits, and the discovery of the world of things around use. Components How does an ultrasonic sensor work? My latest project was to use an ultrasonic sensor to detect distance.
